src:
Radnički traži odlaganje utakmice u Novom Sadu
06 Nov 2019, 13:24 by Darko
Fudbalski klub Radnički u subotu od 14 sati gostuje novosadskom Proleteru u sklopu 16. kola Superlige Srbije, ali kako stvari danas stoje odigravanje te utakmice je pod velikim znakom pitanja.
Fudbalere Radničkog je po po povratku iz Sente gde su igrali sa TSC-om (0:2) “pokosio” stomačni virus, pa današnji trening nije odradilo čak 12 igrača, od kojih su devetorica standardni prvotimci.
U pitanju su Nermin Haskić, Stefan Mihajlović, Lazar Đorđević, Ivan Ostojić, Rebin Sulaka, Dušan Pantelić, Filip Knežević, Riota Noma i Marko Knežević.
Šef stručnog štaba Nišlija Milorad Kosanović izjavio je posle današnjeg treninga da će klub najverovatnije tražiti da se utakmica protiv Proletera odloži.
– Imamo velike probleme koji su krenuli u ponedeljak. Sve je eskaliralo u utorak kada je “otpalo” devet igrača, da bi im se jutros pridružila još trojica. Još uvek ne znamo šta je. Da li je grip, stomačni virus ili su igrači nešto loše pojeli u Senti. Obaviće se pregledi pa ćemo znati tačan uzrok. U svakom slučaju, mi smo desetkovani i teško je raditi u ovakvim uslovima. Situacija je trenutno takva da mi nećemo imati igrače da igramo utakmicu u subotu. Sve je krenulo od golmana Marka Kneževića, posle njega se razboleo Nikola Čumić, a kada smo se vratili iz Sente nastao je pravi haos. Kada sam jutros došao na trening nisam mogao da verujem šta vidim i koliko igrača nam nedostaje. Ne smemo ništa prepustiti slučaju, rekao sam im da nikako ne dolaze na stadion, ne bi li se sačuvali ovi koji su ostali zdravi. Iskreno, ja mislim da ne postoje šanse da se oni oporave do subotu. Sačekaćemo izveštaje lekara i ukoliko oni to potvrde, mi ćemo zvanično tražiti da se meč sa Proleterom odloži – rekao je Kosanović.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Radnicki is seeking a postponement of the match in Novi Sad
06 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Darko
Radnicki football club will play host to Proleter from Novi Sad as part of the 16th round of Super League of Serbia on Saturday, but how things are going today is a big question mark.
On their return from Senta, where they played with TSC (0: 2), Radnicki football players were cut down by a stomach virus, so today not even 12 players took part in the training, nine of which are standard first team players.
These include Nermin Haskic, Stefan Mihajlovic, Lazar Djordjevic, Ivan Ostojic, Rebin Sulaka, Dusan Pantelic, Filip Knezevic, Riota Noma and Marko Knezevic.
Nišli's Chief of Staff Milorad Kosanovic said after training today that the club would most likely ask for a game against Proleter to be postponed.
- We have big problems that started on Monday. It escalated on Tuesday when nine players were dropped and three more would join them this morning. We still don't know what is. Is it the flu, the stomach virus or are the players eating something wrong in Senta. Reviews will be done so we will know the exact cause. In any case, we are decimated and it is difficult to work in these conditions. The situation is currently such that we will not have players to play the game on Saturday. It all started from goalkeeper Marko Knezevic, Nikola Čumić got sick after him, and when we returned from Senta, a real chaos ensued. When I came to training this morning, I couldn't believe what I was seeing and how many players we were missing. We must not leave anything to chance, I told them not to come to the stadium in order to preserve those who remained healthy. Honestly, I don't think there is a chance that they will recover by Saturday. We will wait for the doctors' reports and if they confirm it, we will officially demand that the proletarian match be postponed - Kosanovic said.
